column6:
"The Murdock Papers" continue! The Bendis/Maleev era rockets towards its shocking conclusion as Matt Murdock makes one of the most important decision of his entire life. Part 5 (of 6).,2005,12


32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
